definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer

sentences.english: The technology and the die design of cold extruding for the electric hammer drill is described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了電錘鑽頭冷擠壓工藝及模具設計。

sentences.english: "A" Taper Drill Bits are designed for use in a rotary hammer equipped with an "A" Taper type chuck.
sentences.chinese: 型錐形鑽頭適用於裝配了“A”型圓錐型夾頭的電錘。

sentences.english: Production of Hammer, electric drills , electric pole and tools.
sentences.chinese: 生產各類電錘，電鑽，磨光機等電動工具。
